function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Disruption of building information modeling bim and knowledge management km","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of phones","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper use of bluetooth receivers in public places for contact mapping of infected patients","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of cryptographic protocols without compromising the privacy and ethics of the patients","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential misuse of published contact information of infected patients, leading to tracking and identification of patient locations.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate containment and mitigation framework for covid-19 due to gaps in wastewater surveillance from the source.","category":"Public health measures can lead to the spread of waterborne diseases, including covid-19.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate optimization of treatment plant performance can result in the ineffective removal of pollutants, including emerging pollutants, from the water supply.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of cybersecurity measures
